oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams performances
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various excerpts of performances by Hank Williams (performer), Audrey Williams (performer), and Jerry Rivers (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Jerry Rivers; Audrey Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Williams introduces the tune -- I Just Told Mama Goodbye (Hank Williams) -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- There'll Be No Teardrops Tonight (Hank Williams) -- Arkansas Traveler (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Hank Williams talks (incomplete) -- Boil Them Cabbage Down (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Hank Williams talks -- Help Me Understand (Audrey Williams, Hank Williams) -- Fishers Hornpipe (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Hank Williams talks -- [Unidentified] talks -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- They'll Never Take Her Love From Me (Hank Williams) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- They'll Never Take Her Love From Me (Hank Williams)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Audrey, 1923-1975; Rivers, Jerry, 1928-;
